title: S4 Ep7: Patent pools for generic drugs
itunes:title: Patent pools for generic drugs
description: Diffusion of new drugs is painfully slow in low-income countries. Mark Schankerman tells Tim Phillips about how patent pools accelerate the process, and how we could still do a better job of licensing life-saving medicines.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
